backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles, phone validation, and conversation/message storage with media attachments.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high-level feature requirements to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of key frontend files describing navigation, components, utilities, and styling.
Detailed checklist for promoting a preview build to production, including verification, deployment, and rollback steps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining theme variables, dark mode rules, and base element styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root container and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controlling authentication, section-based navigation, splash screen, and dialogs for profile setup and contacts sync.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Renders the main app header with logo, navigation, auth handling, and user profile menu, restricting certain sections unless authenticated.
frontend/src/components/BrandLogo.tsx: Displays the Vibechat logo image with fallback text styling if loading fails, supporting multiple size options.
frontend/src/components/CameraCaptureDia: Provides a dialog for taking photos using the device camera, handling permissions, errors, preview, and capture actions.
frontend/src/components/chat/Conversatio: Displays a conversation view with participant header, message timeline, and composer, loading participant info when needed.
Shows the user’s conversation list with loading and error states, allowing selection of a conversation.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageComp: Handles composing and sending messages with text, media attachments, upload progress, and optional WhatsApp sharing.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageTime: Fetches and displays messages with media support, handling loading, errors, and auto-scrolling.
frontend/src/components/chat/NewConversa: Dialog for creating a new conversation by entering and validating a Principal ID.
frontend/src/components/ContactsSyncDial: Lets users sync and match contacts via picker or manual input, showing matched Vibechat users and sync results.
frontend/src/components/ProfileDialog.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/ProfilePhotoPick: Allows users to choose or capture a profile photo, validating files and previewing the selected image.
frontend/src/components/SplashScreen.tsx: Shows an initial splash screen with logo and animated dots, fading out automatically after a set duration.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppStyleAut: Implements a multi-step authentication flow including phone entry, verification, and profile setup with photo upload.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including creating AuthClient instances and exposing login state and actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with user-related canister methods such as profiles, phone availability, and password management.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for colors, layout, and UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/ChatsPage.tsx: Displays the chat interface with a conversation list, conversation detail view, and a dialog for starting new chats.
frontend/src/pages/GroupsPage.tsx: Renders a placeholder page indicating that group chat functionality is coming soon.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Implements the marketing landing page with hero content, feature highlights, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/LivePage.tsx: Shows a placeholder page announcing upcoming live audio/video broadcast features.
frontend/src/pages/StatusPage.tsx: Displays a placeholder page for a future disappearing-status feature.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Provides a placeholder page indicating that video-sharing features are in development.
frontend/src/utils/fileBytes.ts: Validates image files by type and size, then reads them into a Uint8Array using FileReader.
frontend/src/utils/phoneNumbers.ts: Provides utilities to normalize, extract, and deduplicate phone numbers from text or contacts and detect Contacts Picker support.
frontend/src/utils/readFileAsBytesAny.ts: Validates images or videos up to 50MB and reads them as Uint8Array for attachments.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash‑based routing compatibility.
frontend/src/utils/whatsappShare.ts: Builds and opens WhatsApp Web share URLs with prefilled text.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes project state, goals, constraints, existing features, and known issues for the Vibechat app.
